name: Squad Attack!
description:
Discover the fascinating world of magic with a brand-new arcade game. In Squad Attack, you are a leader of the squad that frees fantasy lands from unwanted intruders. Use your squad’s power to strike evil-minded creatures like goblins and orcs and break through different barriers.

Move through the lands controlled by the Horde and get paid after each won fight and completed level. Visit the Tavern to upgrade soldiers and unlock new warriors to make the squad even stronger to defeat the most powerful enemies with ease. See your progress on the map and share your progress on social media.

Ready to destroy your enemies? Try Squad Attack today!
